description:
The battle between Luffy and Moria reaches its epic end, and the gargantuan shadow of the towering brute known as Kuma causes a panic on the island!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les crises s’enchaînent ! Ordre d’extermination des pirates au chapeau de paille !
Not Out of Danger Yet! Orders to Annihilate the Straw Hat Crew!
Owaranai Kiki! Mugiwara Ichimi Massatsu Shirei
Приказ об уничтожении команды Соломенной шляпы
لم ينته الخطر بعد! أوامر بإبادة طاقم قبعة القش!
終わらない危機! 麦わら一味抹殺指令
